DOC.brief_summary: This registry will evaluate long-term safety and efficacy of deferasirox in children with transfusional iron overload.
DOC.brief_title: ENTRUST, a 5 Year Surveillance of Children Aged 2 to <6 Years With Transfusional Iron Overload Treated With Deferasirox
DOC.criteria: History of transfusiondependent anemia. History of iron overload Patients with nontransfusional hemosiderosis. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
